item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, November 19, 2024 at 6:20 PM UTC
item.description:

3. Hand Tracking for Mouse Input (22 points | 4 comments)

22. Maslow 4: Large format CNC routing made accessible (192 points | 62 comments)
23. 20 years of Google Scholar (374 points | 160 comments)
24. Two undersea cables in Baltic Sea disrupted (456 points | 754 comments)
25. Ask HN: How do you communicate in a remote startup? (112 points | 142 comments)
26. Red Hat and Microsoft Bringing RHEL to WSL (40 points | 19 comments)
27. Hyperfine: A command-line benchmarking tool (199 points | 45 comments)
28. DOJ will push Google to sell off Chrome (958 points | 1075 comments)
29. MailCatcher runs a super simple SMTP server (270 points | 85 comments)
30. Gliimly is a programming language for web services (49 points | 53 comments)
